name: outlook-add-in-auth-aspnet-graph
title: Get Excel workbooks using Microsoft Graph and MSAL in an Outlook Add-in
shortDescription: Learn how to build a Microsoft Outlook Add-in that connects to Microsoft Graph, finds the first three workbooks stored in OneDrive for Business, fetches their filenames, and inserts the names into a new message compose form in Outlook.
longDescription: Learn how to build a Microsoft Outlook Add-in that connects to Microsoft Graph, finds the first three workbooks stored in OneDrive for Business, fetches their filenames, and inserts the names into a new message compose form in Outlook.

references.name: Authorize to Microsoft Graph from an Office Add-in
references.description: Your add-in can get authorization to Microsoft Graph data by obtaining an access token to Microsoft Graph from the Microsoft identity platform.
